LanguageData.LetterHousekeeperCatWandersIn: A wild housekeeper cat wanders into the area.\n\nThey are genetically engineered to be friendly towards humans, so it would not be too difficult to tame, if you need a pet.
LanguageData.LetterHousekeeperCatJoin: A stray housekeeper cat wanders into the area.\n\nLooks like it lost its owner and decided to adopt you as a new one. Resistance is futile.
